divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a giant super bright star that I thought was a planet until I rounded the corner and it followed. It had on an extremely bright light in front and it was flying really low. I turned the corner again and all of a sudden the back side of it was on the other side of the highaway. There were 2 other lights in the back. One on each side. It didnt make any noise when it passed over and crossed a very large amount of distance in seconds.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Carson City
There were no other sightings in Carson City on or around December 5th 2009
